thread.title: BRIEF-Fortress Credit Says Sent Letter To Perry Ellis Reaffirming Offer To Acquire Co In “Going Private” Transaction

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Fortress Credit Says Sent Letter To Perry Ellis Reaffirming Offer To Acquire Co In “Going Private” Transaction

organizations.name: brief-fortress credit says sent letter to perry ellis reaffirming offer to acquire co

text:
April 9 (Reuters) - Fortress Credit Advisors:
* FORTRESS CREDIT ADVISORS SAYS ON APRIL 9, SENT LETTER TO PERRY ELLIS INTERNATIONAL REAFFIRMING OFFER TO ACQUIRE IN “GOING PRIVATE” TRANSACTION
* FORTRESS CREDIT ADVISORS SAYS REAFFIRM GEORGE FELDENKREIS' PROPOSAL, INCLUDING PRICE OF $27.50/SHR OF OUTSTANDING COMMON STOCK OF PERRY ELLIS Source text: ( bit.ly/2HmUT8j ) Further company coverage:
